li.a: Center ISD Modified Public Comment Regulation
Center ISD Public Comment for Board Meetings Hotline

span.em: Per Texas Governor Greg Abbott, Center ISD will remain closed for the remainder of the 19-20 school year.

strong.br: Instructional Delivery and Meal Services are in the process of being reinstated. See below for details.

div.p: Welcome to Center ISD - Center ISD is a K-12 public education school located in the heart of the Piney Woods of East Texas. Located at the geographical center of Shelby County, Center is the county seat and the largest school district in the county. Rated a Conference 4A district in UIL athletic and academic competition with 6 campuses and over 2600 students. Home to the Roughriders, Center ISD is committed to promoting academic excellence, human relations, and physical well being to all students through programs based on equity and excellence.

li.a: Campus Improvement Plan ~ Center High School
Campus Improvement Plan ~ Center Middle School
Campus Improvement Plan ~ Center Intermediate School
Campus Improvement Plan ~ Center Elementary School
Campus Improvement Plan ~ F.L. Moffett Primary School

span.style: font-size: 22px;
span.a:
Bully Prevention
In accordance with SB179 aka David’s Law

span.style: font-size: 18px;
font-size: 16px;
font-size: 16px;
span.br:
jake.henson@centerisd.org
Center Intermediate School
Lee Masterson
lee.masterson@centerisd.org
Center Elementary School
Lana Whitworth
lana.whitworth@centerisd.org
F L Moffett Primary
Inez Hughes
inez.hughes@centerisd.org

div.p: The UIL has canceled all athletic events until May 4th due to the Coronavirus.

span.style: font-family: oswaldlight, sans-serif; font-size: 32px; color: #451c79;
font-size: 20px;
font-size: 18px;
font-size: 16px;

p.span:
Center ISD wants to make sure that all students have access to meals during the District’s closure. CISD is resuming free grab-n-go breakfast and lunch meals at one location in the District beginning on Thursday, April 23rd . Breakfast and Lunch will be given out at one time. Adjustments to this schedule will be made as needed, so please continue to check our webpage for new information.
Grab-n-go meals will be available for curbside pick-up only at the following location and time:
CHS (old student parking lot – next to the cafeteria)
Breakfast & Lunch 10:30 a.m.-1:00 p.m. Both meals at once.
Daily menus will include a variety of hot and cold foods. Access to enter the buildings will not be available. This program will remain in effect until further notice.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 18px; color: #000000;
span.strong: Instructional Distribution and Assignment Drop Off Details per Campus for Monday, April 27

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;
span.strong: Center High School Instructional Distribution and Assignment Drop Off - 4/27/2020

span.style: font-size: 14pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: Students and parents can pick up instructional materials and drop off completed assignments on Monday, April 27th. Distribution and drop off will be in the teacher parking lot, please stay in your vehicles, packets will be brought to you. Student packets will be distributed by homeroom. If a parent is picking up the packet they will need to know their child’s 3rd period homeroom teacher’s name. If returning packets please make sure the grade level, student’s and teacher’s name is on all assignments.

br.span: The morning time will be divided by grade level:

li.span: Any grade can come at this time

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: Please drop off any completed work at this time.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

li.span: We will utilize the same delivery lines as used on March 23rd.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

li.span: You will not need to leave your car for Pick Up or Drop Off. Please remain in your car at all times.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

li.span: You will be handed a folder with your child’s instructional material in it

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

li.span: You will not need to sign for materials.

p.span: As always, if you have any questions please email me at

span.strong: Center Intermediate School Instructional Distribution and Assignment Drop Off - 4/27/2020

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: Center Intermediate School (4th&5th Grade) will be holding a packet pick up on Monday, April 27th from 8:00-12:30 in front of the gym. All students need to make arrangements to pick up new assignments and turn in completed assignments.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: *Your child's campus/team shirt as well as other personal items will be in the packet.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: *Please return all Beef Stick Fundraiser money. (Prizes will still be awarded.)

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: *5th Grader packets will include a 6th Grade Course Request form. This form must be returned at the end of the year to assist with scheduling your desired electives next year.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffff00; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: #ffffff; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: (TEACHERS please arrive 15 minutes early). We will pass packets out by teacher. Each will have their own homeroom. We will line cars like parent pick up and call your name and student name and you will deliver packet to cars (gloves required). Sped students will have to have parents sign that they received work. Hill and Nichols will take care of this.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: *Everyone will be expected to wear a mask and gloves. We have plenty of gloves and we are trying to locate masks. Please plan your own mask such as a bandana, scarf or other creative masks that have been on social media. I am thinking we will not find masks.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;
span.strong: F L Moffett Instructional Distribution and Assignment Drop Off - 4/27/2020

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: F.L. Moffett parents may pick up student work packets on Monday, April 27th from 8:00 a.m. - 12:30 p.m. in the parent pick up line in front of the school. During pickup, we will also return all field trip shirts and supplies that your students may have had at school. You may turn in your child’s finished Week 1-2 packets at this time. If you need to turn the packets in at a later time, we will have bins labeled with grade levels for you to leave your child’s work. These bins will be located outside of the school. Make sure the student's name and teacher are written on the packet. All completed packets are due by May 15th in order for your child to receive credit. Please share this information with all FLM parents!

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: #000000;

p.span: Los padres de los estudiantes de F.L. Moffett pueden recoger los paquetes de trabajo para los estudiantes el lunes 27 de abril de 8:00 a.m. a 12:30 pm en la línea donde se forman para recoger a los estudiantes después de la escuela. Durante esta distribución, usted recibirá la playera y los útiles que su estudiante haya dejado en la escuela. Usted puede entregar los paquetes de la semana 1 y 2 completado por su hijo(a) en este tiempo. Si necesita entregar el trabajo en una fecha más tarde, tendremos recipientes para que deje el trabajo de su hijo(a). Los niveles de grado estarán indicados en los recipientes. Los recipientes estarán afuera de la escuela. Asegúrese que el nombre del estudiante y la maestra del estudiante este escrito en el paquete que va entregar. Todos los paquetes completados deben ser entregados a más tardar el 15 de mayo para que su hijo(a) reciba crédito. ¡Por favor comparta esta información con todos los padres de FLM!

span.style: font-size: 16px;
span.a: Information Regarding COVID-19 and School Closures

span.style: font-size: 16px;
span.a: Información relativa a COVID-19 y cierres de escuelas

with the
Center ISD App

div.p:
Center Independent School District
P.O. Box 1689 | 107 PR 605 | Center, Texas 75935
(936) 598-5642

Business Hours Monday - Friday 7:30AM - 4:30PM
The Center Independent School District, as an equal opportunity educational provider and employer, does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, sexual orientation and/or age in educational programs or activities that it operates or in employment decisions. The District is required by Title VI and Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Americans with Disabilities Act, and the Age Discrimination Act of 1975, as amended, as well as Board policy not to discriminate in such a manner.

a.title: ezTask: Exceptional websites that are affordable and easy to update!
